title: Calculate maximum new loans at $110 million

content.question: A bank has $200 million in demand deposits and $150 million in reserves. The reserve ratio is 20 percent. What is the maximum amount of loans the bank can make from its reserves?

topic.text: 4.4: Banking and the Expansion of the Money Supply

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model using quantitative data or calculations.
